summary: I HAVE A 2003 CHEVY SILVERADO 4X4 EXT. CAB 4.8L ENG. WHILE DRIVING THE BRAKE PEDAL WENT ALL THE WAY TO THE FLOOR AND BRAKE FLUID WAS LEAKING UNDERNEATH THE FRONT OF THE VEHICLE. THE BRAKE LINES WERE RUSTED AND CORRODED ON THE OUTSIDE.  I WILL BE REPLACING THEM.   I HAVE ONLY 70,000 MILES ON IT.   I HAVE OWNED NUMEROUS VEHICLES AND THIS IS THE FIRST TIME  I HAVE EXPERIENCED RUSTED BRAKE LINES.  ABOUT 5 MONTHS AGO I HAD THE SAME PROBLEM BUT ON A DIFFERENT BRAKE LINE ON THE REAR, THANK HEAVEN FOR SECONDARY BACKUP LINES. *TR
